resources.string:
Smart Tools contains Live Crypto, VPN, Lock, Radio, Resumes and App Manager.
Smart Tools is the complete package manager. It has now 8 most trendy apps. More apps are coming...
# Super VPN - * 100% free fastest VPN to unblock facebook, twitter, youtube and also to secure your full mobile connection. * Auto find best speedy VPN server to make secure connection. * Make favorite list with your prefer VPN server.
# Live Crypto - * Listing prices of live crypto currencies. * Showing details info of each crypto currency.
# Smart Lock - * Lock Photos and Videos. * Lock recent apps. * Uninstallation Prevention. * Lock incoming call.
# Resume Plus - Build unlimited resumes in a minutes.
# Questions - Open and free trivia question database.
# Smart Radio - Play online radio with 25000+ stations from all around the worlds.
# App Manager - View system and user apps, launch and more.
# Keep Notes - Save and track your daily important notes easily.
# Learn Words - Learn daily words with pronunciation, translation, synonyms, antonyms and definitions. Solve quiz of synonyms and antonyms from million words.
